component.name: ExpressLRS Configurator
component.summary: Cross platform configuration tool for the ExpressLRS firmware

description.p: ExpressLRS-Configurator is a cross platform configuration tool for the ExpressLRS firmware. Allowing you to configure your ExpressLRS radio module and bind it to your transmitter. Or just keep them up to date.
